original_text: This was the list of the Levites according to their clans: of Gershon, the clan of the Gershonites; of Kohath, the clan of the Kohathites; of Merari, the clan of the Merarites.
korean_text: 레위인으로 계수된 자들의 종족들은 이러하니 게르손에게서 난 게르손 종족과 고핫에게서 난 고핫 종족과 므라리에게서 난 므라리 종족이며

sentences.original_text: This was the list of the Levites according to their clans
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들의 족보에 따른 명단은 다음과 같았습니다.

sentences.original_text: of Gershon, the clan of the Gershonites
of Kohath, the clan of the Kohathites
of Merari, the clan of the Merarites
